title: 4 Easy Ways to Draw a Boat

steps.title: Sketch the main body of the sailboat.
steps.content: Sketch the main body of the sailboat. Start by drawing a trapezoid shape.

steps.title: Sketch a line perpendicular to the body of the boat.
steps.content: Sketch a line perpendicular to the body of the boat. Next, draw a small trapezoid where this line is connected to the boat.

steps.title: Sketch another line.
steps.content: Sketch another line. This time, place the line perpendicular to the first. Add more details to the stand of the mast.

steps.title: Add the shape of the sails.
steps.content: Add the shape of the sails. Do this by drawing triangles, then add a line just above the body of the boat.

steps.title: Add the guidelines for the distinct shape of the boat.
steps.content: Add the guidelines for the distinct shape of the boat.

steps.title: Draw the basic outline of the boat.
steps.content: Draw the basic outline of the boat.

steps.title: Erase the pencil marks.
steps.content: Erase the pencil marks. Add a few extra details, as you see fit.

steps.title: Color the boat.
steps.content: Color the boat.

steps.title: Sketch a long oblong.
steps.content: Sketch a long oblong.

steps.title: Sketch a line 2/3 of the oblong.
steps.content: Sketch a line 2/3 of the oblong.

steps.title: Draw 2 curved line along the mid-line.
steps.content: Draw 2 curved line along the mid-line.

steps.title: Add the primary sketch of the bottom of the kayak.
steps.content: Add the primary sketch of the bottom of the kayak.

steps.title: Draw a curvy line along the primary sketch of the bottom of the kayak.
steps.content: Draw a curvy line along the primary sketch of the bottom of the kayak. Also, draw the hole for the person to sit on by drawing a half circle.

steps.title: Sketch a straight line for handle of the oar/paddle.
steps.content: Sketch a straight line for handle of the oar/paddle.

steps.title: Sketch the basic shape for the blade of the oar/paddle.
steps.content: Sketch the basic shape for the blade of the oar/paddle.

steps.title: Draw the basic outline of the boat.
steps.content: Draw the basic outline of the boat.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines. Put more details into your sketch.

steps.title: Color the kayak.
steps.content: Color the kayak. Use colors that would match the background or colors that create a unique design boat.

steps.title: Sketch an upside-down, truncated triangle in the middle of the page.
steps.content: Sketch an upside-down, truncated triangle in the middle of the page. This will be the body of the boat.

steps.title: Draw a triangle on top of the base.
steps.content: Draw a triangle on top of the base.

steps.title: Draw a few squares on the triangle.
steps.content: Draw a few squares on the triangle. These will be the sails.

steps.title: Outline the shape of the boat.
steps.content: Outline the shape of the boat. Add in details, such as wooden planks on the boat's body, a small lifesaver, and a mast behind the sails.

steps.title: Erase the sketch lines.
steps.content: Erase the sketch lines. Make the contour stronger.

steps.title: Add in the color.
steps.content: Add in the color. Follow the illustration for reference or color as you please.

steps.title: Sketch a big teardrop shape in the middle of the page.
steps.content: Sketch a big teardrop shape in the middle of the page. This will be the top part of the boat.

steps.title: Under the teardrop shape draw a long arch.
steps.content: Under the teardrop shape draw a long arch. This will be the body of the boat.

steps.title: Outline the boat's shape.
steps.content: Outline the boat's shape. Add in the details, inside and outside of the boat. Follow the illustration for reference.

steps.title: Erase the sketch lines.
steps.content: Erase the sketch lines. Strengthen the contour with a pencil.

steps.title: Make the boat colorful using the colors of your choice.
steps.content: Make the boat colorful using the colors of your choice.
